Contract Credit/Extension Courses (Academic/CEU)
Single Course
We offer contract credit for contracted professional development/CEU and extension courses for academic credit and professional enrichment.


  







 



FNP Certificate Program
Certificate (Credit)
A two-year, 36-unit program designed for nurses who already hold a Master of Science in Nursing.


  







 



Advanced Human Resource Management Certificate
Certificate (Non-Credit)
The 8-week online program guides students through an exploration and discussion of emerging topics for the HR professional.


  







 



Audio and Recording Production Certificate
Certificate (Non-Credit)
This 2-part program orients the student with the basic technologies and techniques of modern recording and production, culminating in a capstone project.


  







 



Cal-OSHA Industry Training
Certificate (Non-Credit)
Students will receive an industry-recognized Cal/OSHA 30-hour course completion card and certificate for general industry, related to these aspects of the cannabis industry.


  







 



Construction Management Certificate
Certificate (Non-Credit)
This Certificate provides education and training for anyone interested in advancing in a career in the construction industry.


  







 



Human Resource Management Certificate
Certificate (Non-Credit)
The program teaches the skills and knowledge required to successfully manage human resources in today's complex business environment.


  







 



Humanistic Leadership
Certificate (Non-Credit)
Be a Humanistic Leader placing people over profit to make your business more sustainable. This course teaches "leading" through three skills, leading, managing, and coaching.


  







 



Maker Educator Certificate
Certificate (Non-Credit)
The program offers a series of mini-courses designed for people seeking to lead maker activities in schools, clubs, community centers, libraries, and other organizations.  

  







 



Nonprofit Management
Certificate (Non-Credit)
Gain a deeper understanding of the nonprofit sector as a whole, along with the key elements involved in managing and working in a nonprofit organization.
 


  







 



Process Improvement Management Certificate
Certificate (Non-Credit)
This 10-week Certificate program is comprised of the most beneficial business process improvement methods and tools utilized in many industries.


  







 



Project Management Certificate
Certificate (Non-Credit)
 This course presents practical methods, tools, and techniques for accomplishing project goals more successfully.


  







 



Sustainable Professional Skills
Certificate (Non-Credit)
This program is 100% online.  Each week for 8 weeks there will be a focused discussion that enables collaboration, networking, and the development of new ideas.


  







 



Wine Business Institute Professional Programs
Certificate (Non-Credit)




The WBI professional programs equip students with skills and tools to lead effective and successful careers in the wine business.






  







 



BA Liberal Studies Degree Completion Programs in North Bay
Bachelor's Degree
SSU partners with North Bay community colleges near you to provide a pathway for students to earn a B.A. in Liberal Studies.


  







 



BS​ Business Administration Degree Completion Programs in North Bay
Bachelor's Degree
SSU partners with colleges near you to provide a pathway for students to earn a B.S. in Business Admin with a concentration in Mgmt.


  







 



Saturday Hybrid Liberal Studies Degree Completion Program
Bachelor's Degree
*Graduates of this program are eligible to apply for the CSET Multiple Subject Exam waiver.

  







 



Degree Completion Programs
Bachelor's Degree
Flexible bachelor's degree completion programs for busy adults. Start here.


  







 



Executive MBA in Global Wine Business
Master's Degree
A transformative experiential leadership development program that integrates wine business knowledge and industry-specific tools.


  







 



MA Organization Development
Master's Degree
The M.A. in Organization Development prepares you to create more effective human systems.


  







 



MA Spanish
Master's Degree
Complete your MA Spanish degree within Master of Arts in Spanish within a span of three summers!


  







 



Arts and Design
Online Courses by 3rd-Party Providers
Online graphic design and web design programs make it easy for you to learn new skills or transition to a new career.


  







 



Business Courses
Online Courses by 3rd-Party Providers
Online management training and business skills programs can help you enter a new career field or advance your current skillset.


  







 



Computer Applications Courses
Online Courses by 3rd-Party Providers
Whether you want to earn Microsoft certifications, learn QuickBooks, or even Photoshop, these online training programs can help you achieve your goals.


  







 



Computer Science Courses
Online Courses by 3rd-Party Providers
Prepare for a career in software development or web development with online programming courses and programs. 


  







 



Health and Fitness Courses
Online Courses by 3rd-Party Providers
These online training programs can help you start or advance a rewarding career in helping people lead healthier lives.


  







 



Online Learning Center
Online Courses by 3rd-Party Providers
The School of Extended & International Education offers affordable, self-paced, and accessible online certificate programs that meet the needs of today's working professional.


  







 



Trade Courses
Online Courses by 3rd-Party Providers
The convenience of online training allows you to learn new concepts and skills at your own pace and in the comfort of your own home.
